I have to counter on the hydro electric as well. At least here in California where it's hot we have no water to power our hydro electric plants
Water is just as susceptible to nature as wind is.
Water however can be more reliable
there are reserves set in place in times of drought
It can be reliable but on the other hand reserves do dry up. The water may not always be there. We've gone through our reserve in the last 3 years
On the other hand we have wind almost every other day.
